sample_docs: Unleash the full potential of AI in intelligent cars AI toolkit for Neural Networks performance optimization and high BPU utilization Download Product Brief Flexible Supports mainstream frameworks including TensorFlow and PyTorch and MXNet Comprehensive Supports state-of-the-art operators used in modern neural networks. High performance Automatic optimizing compiler ensures most efficient utilization of the BPU engine. Easy to Use Abundant documentation and design examples to accelerate development. 2 weeks Typical time to port 85 % Typical BPU MAC utilization 8 bit Quantization 3 X Typical performance improvements Powerful optimizing compiler and example models at your fingertip High parallelism Workload is broken down at kernel or feature map level to be efficiently processed by the BPU Pipelining BPU pipelining is automatically optimized by the compiler Layer fusion Perform global model computation analysis, followed by vertical and horizontal layer fusion Model Zoo Pre-trained AI algorithms to accelerate your development Minimum effort. Maximum model performance Solutions Served OpenExplorer let you port and optimize your software quickly and easily to Journey processor deep learning engine ADAS Customers look to Horizon for more cost-effective, ultra low-power solutions, with better front camera detection features Autonomous Driving Global R&D efforts continue toward the self-driving car. Fast pace innovations demand the most efficient AI processing architecture MaaS & Delivery Robot MaaS adoption and the 24/7 e-commerce fuel the need for a highly effective perception compute solution to improve functionality and cost Efficient AI Computing Let's talk about our journey together! Designed for AI compute Perception workloads Designed for the optimum runtime execution of Vision and LiDAR perception tasks Benchmarks Outperforms competition in benchmarks of modern neural networks such as Mobilenetv2 and EfficientNet Bx in latency and throughput Open AI Toolchain Effectively enables your deep learning model to be optimized for the BPU CNN engine Automotive grade Complies with automotive quality, reliability and safety standards, including AEC-Q100 grade 2 True AI performance measured in accuracy, speed and efficiency Check Journey 5 Perception video 40 Gbps Video input 128 TOPS INT8 peak compute 60 ms Typical Latency 30 W Typical power in ADAS/AD EFFICIENT AI PACKED INTO HORIZON'S HIGHEST PERFORMANCE PROCESSOR WITH HIGH-LEVEL AD CAPABILITIES HORIZON INNOVATIVE "BPU" AI ENGINE ARCHITECTURE Bayes BPU: Purpose-built for Automotive Intelligence - Highly parallel AI processing with multiple concurrent compute units - A powerful systolic array of tensor cores for efficient CNN operations - Flexible, large scale near-compute-memory for local execution - High-flexibility high-bandwidth custom concurrent data bridge - Data parallelism. Kernel parallelism. Computation unit parallelism - Instruction parallelism. Layer parallelism. Model parallelism (*) Tensor unit: Conv operations Data reshape unit: Padding, reorder, Concat … Domain specific unit: Pool, resize, warp … Vector unit: Elem wise calc. on vector and matrices (row-by-row, column-column or tile-by-tile) JOURNEY 5 AUTOMOTIVE INTELLIGENCE PROCESSOR Rich and Diverse Computing for End-to-End Autonomous driving Deep Learning: - 128 AI TOPS - Highly parallel architecture - Optimized for perf. at low batch - Memory-near-compute / custom data bridge - Systolic CNN compute units - Feature and weight compression to save memory bandwidth System support: - Up to 16 Camera ingest @ 40Gbps - 4x 4 MIPI CSI2 RX ports / 16 lanes - MIPI TX output to display @ 20Gbps - 2x GbE with TSN/PTP support IEEE 1588 and IEEE 802.1 - 64b LPDDR4/x with inline ECC - PCIe Gen3 2 lanes - 4x CAN FD for Radar integration Compute Diversity: - 8x Cortex-A55 CPU - 2x ISP @ 1.3Gp/s. HDR pixel tone mapping - CV engine (GDC, Pyramid, Stitching, Optical Flow) - 2x Vision P6 DSP for flexibility - 4K HEVC Codec for data logging - Hardware Crypto with Elliptic curve Safety and reliability: - 2x core lockstep M-Series MCU - Safety island for system monitoring - ASIL B SEooC - Trustzone. TRNG. Latest Crypto - AEC-Q100 Grade 2 - Power efficient at 25-30W typical - 16nm FinFET - 27x27mm FCBGA1588 / 0.65mm EFFICIENT ORCHESTRATION OF A DIVERSE COMPUTING ENSEMBLE Integrated, Streamlined Compute Collaboration with High Flexibility, Efficiency and Safety STEADY PROGRESS TOWARD JOURNEY 5 SAFETY GOALS JOURNEY 5 CYBERSECURITY Comprehensive security measures with hardware acceleration and ARM TrustZone architecture Trusted & dedicated resources Secure boot, clock, compute and memory on ARM Trust zone (TZ) architecture. Memory protected by ECC Fully encrypted & HW-accelerated Extensive crypto engines, Hardware TRNG and Key generation I/O Protected Hardware firewall for interconnect, DDR and I/O & peripherals; Debug (JTAG) with Authorization OCOTP On chip one-time programmable memory JOURNEY 5 EVM KIT Rich and Diverse Computing for End-to-End Autonomous driving MATRIX® 5 INTELLIGENT VEHICLE COMPUTING CENTER Horizon Open Reference Design Accelerates Partner's Time to Success MATRIX® 5 ACCELERATION CARDS Solutions Served Journey AI processors are scalable from ADAS to Robotaxi applications as well as in-cabin AI systems. Journey 2 has won the coveted Product-of-the-Year award in the category of Automotive Solutions in June 2020 ADAS Customers look to Horizon for more cost-effective, ultra low-power solutions, with better front camera detection features In Cabin Safety & Comfort Safety requirements and a better user experience drive the demand for Horizon AI in-cabin technology MaaS & Delivery Robot MaaS adoption and the 24/7 e-commerce fuel the need for a highly effective perception compute solution to improve functionality and cost Autonomous Driving Global R&D efforts continue toward the self-driving car. Fast pace innovations demand the most efficient AI processing architecture Efficient AI Computing Let's talk about our journey together! The Next Generation Optimized AI Platform is Here AI Processor Journey 2 Horizon Journey ™ Journey 3 Horizon Journey ™ Next Journey Horizon Journey ™ Journey 2 Designed with insights into the most advanced deep learning algorithms, our 2nd generation edge-AI processor features a deep learning accelerator with unmatched efficiency to empower your AI applications. AEC-Q100 grade 2, in mass production here Journey 3 The latest specialized AI System-on-Chip from Horizon Robotics is perfectly balanced for performance, cost and power, in less than a 3W power envelope. With 5 DL TOPS, outstanding ISP image quality and a powerful H265 codec, you can ensure best perception results in your ADAS, DMS or APA functions! Development boards available now here Journey 5 Innovation in AI and Autonomous machines continues to accelerate. We keep up with the pace and will unveil our most impressive AI processor yet in early 2021. Look for a 10x deep learning performance improvement, ASIL B, DSP support and much more! Stay tuned AI Algorithms Semantic segmentation Vision Perception Detection and Classification Vision Perception Camera Tracking Vision Perception LiDAR Processing LiDAR Perception CNN Benchmarks Journey BPU ™ Driver Monitoring AI In-cabin Audio/Intelligent speech front end AI In-cabin Semantic Segmentation Low latency and high framerate pixel level accuracy for up to 23 classes including freespace, lane and road boundaries, poles, construction zones, road markings, buildings and vegetation. Ask for our Model Zoo sample code Detection and Classification Horizon Robotics provides robust, state-of-the art detection and classification algorithms, combining the latest advances in deep learning with our own research. Check our 2D and 3D detection for all relevant object classes in perception! Ask for our Model Zoo sample code Camera Tracking Our multi-camera tracking solution improves the stability of vision perception results and reduces false positives of 3D bounding boxes. Our algorithms makes the most effective use of the BPU and ARM CPU cores of the Journey AI processor Low compute cost and high engine utilization LiDAR Processing Point pillar and other LiDAR point cloud algorithms run very efficiently on Journey AI processor BPU. In just a couple of Watts, 3D bounding boxes are generated at over 40fps from a cloud of points and can be fused with camera semantic segmentation results, for a more robust perception Ask for our LiDAR demo and design example CNN Benchmarks Journey BPU outperforms todays widely adopted prototyping platforms on most popular CNN models, in power efficiency, latency and cost effectiveness. For a more comprehensive, fair and application-oriented metric, Horizon introduces MAPS: Mean Accuracy-guaranteed Processing Speed. Efficient neural network processing Driver Monitoring DMS is a critical safety feature for personal cars, fleets and MaaS, even more so with autonomy modes engaged. We directly apply the power and high efficiency of our AI perception platform to provide a complete driver behavior detection system. Check out our in-cabin AI solutions Audio/Intelligent speech front end Our software solution solves the issues of noise, echo and concurrent speech streams in a confined space like a vehicle cabin and enables a more satisfying voice recognition user experience. Check out our in-cabine AI solutions AI Toolchain OpenExplorer AI Toolchain Horizon OpenExplorer OpenExplorer Model Zoo Horizon OpenExplorer OpenExplorer AI Express Horizon OpenExplorer OpenExplorer AI Toolchain Easily port you AI models to run optimally on Horizon Robotics Journey BPU with our AI toolkit. In just a few weeks, quantize, profile, optimize, compile and deploy your deep learning models to get the full benefits of Horizon AI compute platform. Differentiate your own algorithms here OpenExplorer Model Zoo Check our three classes of pre-trained AI algorithms: Classic models trained on public dataset; Horizon Robotics Reference models; Product models trained on our own data. Save time. Save development costs. here OpenExplorer AI Express Open source, AI Application development middleware, including a development framework and scenario application reference solutions, such as Road Perception and Driver Monitoring. Develop your apps quickly and easily here AI Systems Matrix AI Perception Computer Hardware-In-Loop Kit Hardware-In-Loop Kit Frame Grabber Frame Grabber Matrix Horizon Robotics award-winning, road-ready perception computer. Allows developers to test and validate their software, system designers to start their design from a proven reference and fleet managers to directly deploy to their vehicle. Accelerate prototyping and deployment here HIL Kit Companion tool to the Matrix perception compute system, the HIL test kit four-channel video output system enables the playback of real-world or synthetic driving scenario, as a practical complement to on-the-road testing. Test and validate algorithms with real world or simulated data here Frame Grabber Collect data in the vehicle from up to twelve camera with the Horizon Frame Grabber. The ruggedized Frame Grabber can receive data coming directly from the camera, or bypassed from up to three Matrix perception compute systems. Purpose built Edge-AI processors for Intelligent Automotive Applications Scalable processors crafted for AI performance, flexibility, cost and energy efficiency Download Journey 3 Product Brief Efficient Deep Learning Revolutionary Bernoulli2 dual-core Brain Processing Unit with 5 TOPS to accelerate AI workloads Powerful ISP With HDR support, Journey ISP delivers high-quality images in difficult conditions at low latency System-on-Chip Balanced architecture with quad ARM Cortex-A53, deterministic ethernet, USB 3.0 and 4K60 H265 codec in a small 16nm die AI Optimization Harmonizes throughput, low latency, accuracy, energy efficiency and cost effectiveness 16 MP Vision input at 30fps 5 TOPS DL INT8 peak compute 85 % Typical BPU utilization 2.5 W Typical low power in ADAS Designed for AI compute Perception workloads Designed for the optimum runtime execution of Vision and LiDAR perception tasks Benchmarks Outperforms competition in benchmarks of modern neural networks such as Mobilenetv2 and EfficientNet Bx in latency and throughput Open AI Toolchain Effectively enables your deep learning model to be optimized for the BPU CNN engine Automotive grade Complies with automotive quality, reliability and safety standards, including AEC-Q100 grade 2 True AI performance measured in accuracy, speed and efficiency Download Journey 2 Product Brief Solutions Served Journey AI processors are scalable from ADAS to Robotaxi applications as well as in-cabin AI systems.
